scripts.examples:counter: pnpm config set link-workspace-packages false && pnpm install && pnpm --filter "counter" dev
scripts.examples:counter:dev: pnpm config set link-workspace-packages true && pnpm install && turbo run examples:counter:dev
scripts.examples:blog: pnpm config set link-workspace-packages false && pnpm install && pnpm --filter "blog" dev
scripts.examples:blog:dev: pnpm config set link-workspace-packages true && pnpm install && turbo run examples:blog:dev
